Real sprema novu bombu
04 Nov 2019, 14:12 by Darko
Real Madrid priprema novu transfer bombu i pored silnog novca potrošenog tokom leta, neće štedeti.
Na meti „kraljevskog kluba“ je reprezentativac Engleske Rahim Sterling. Gigant iz Madrida je spreman da ponudi Mančester Sitiju 70 miliona funti i Gareta Bejla, za 24-godišnjeg krilnog napadača, preneo je Skaj Sports u ponedeljak.
Sterlingu je, navodi isti izvor, „dojavljeno“ da će ga skauti „kraljevskog kluba“ posmatrati na naredne dve utakmice reprezentacije Engleske, protiv Crne Gore 14. novembra i Kosova, tri dana kasnije.
Sterling sa Mančester Sitijem ima ugovor do juna 2023. godine, a pitanje je koliko bi Pep Gvardiola bio zainteresovan da ga pusti u zamenu za Gareta Bejla i novac.

Real is preparing a new bomb
04 Nov 2019, 13:12 by Darko
Real Madrid are preparing a new transfer bomb and despite the huge amount of money spent in the summer, it will not save.
The target of the Royal Club is England's Rahim Sterling. The Madrid giant is poised to offer £ 70m to Manchester City and Garrett Bale, the 24-year-old winger, told Sky Sports on Monday.
Sterling, according to the same source, was "reported" to be scouted by the "royal club" for the next two games of the England national team, against Montenegro on November 14 and Kosovo, three days later.
Sterling with Manchester City has a contract until June 2023, and the question is how much Pep Guardiola would be interested in letting him go in exchange for Garrett Bale and the money.
